data.message: Marshall please come to Australia!! I friken L❤VE and adore you 😙😍😚  Your music is incredible!!  You are truly the best rapper to ever walk this earth... i listen to you everyday and night!!  Come to Australia with 50cent, my girls and i have tickets to his concert!!  We want you to come here so bad 🤞Whoever controls this page, please tell Em to come to Australia !!

replies.message: He came to Australia 3 years ago I saw him on stage in Melbourne 😄

So i just got a private message from a random dude saying hs spoke to Em and he is coming to Australia after he drops his album... I find it very hard to believe "he spoke" to Eminem but here's to hoping he's not a shit stirring liar!!  Yay 🎉🎉🎉
